definition: to face upward/to look up/to admire/to rely on

sentences.english: Start by lying on the floor, with your hands by your sides.
sentences.chinese: 仰卧于地板上，把双手放在身体两侧。

sentences.english: He lacdfds. com on his back, his teeth set, his right hand clenched on his breast.
sentences.chinese: 他仰卧着，牙关紧闭，右手紧握着拳头胸口上。

sentences.english: Lie on back, knees bent, feet flat on floor.
sentences.chinese: 仰卧，膝关节弯曲，脚底平贴地面。

sentences.english: Would you ever consider sticking to a plan to do ten sit-ups a day?
sentences.chinese: 有想过坚持每天做十个仰卧起坐吗？

sentences.english: We throw bean bags and do sit-ups.
sentences.chinese: 我们玩丢沙包而且做仰卧起坐。

sentences.english: She used to do sit-ups before sleep, but not now.
sentences.chinese: 她过去睡觉前常做仰卧起坐，但现在不做了。

sentences.english: The best position for beginners is with the receiver lying on his back with the giver lying on the stomach along side.
sentences.chinese: 初学者的最佳体位是女方仰卧而男方趴在旁边。

sentences.english: Try push-ups, abdominal crunches and leg squats.
sentences.chinese: 试试俯卧撑，仰卧起坐和下蹲起立。

sentences.english: Which is supported by a structure too expansive for a sit-up.
sentences.chinese: 这由仰卧起坐结构支撑起来太大。
罗勃特，你练习仰卧起坐。

sentences.english: Lie face up on the floor with a towel, scarf or cord in your hands.
sentences.chinese: 身体仰卧于地面，手持毛巾，围巾或绳索。

sentences.english: Many people sprawled on the beach in their bathing uits.
sentences.chinese: 许多人穿着泳衣在海滨仰卧。

sentences.english: If you're bored of sit-ups, try this exercise instead.
sentences.chinese: 如果你厌烦了做仰卧起坐，试试这个练习。

sentences.english: He lay on his back, his teeth set, his right hand clenched on his breast .
sentences.chinese: 他仰卧着，牙关紧闭，右手紧握着拳头放在胸口上。

sentences.english: I need to do 200 sit-ups everyday to get rid of my spare tire.
sentences.chinese: 我每天得做两百次仰卧起坐来消除我的肚腩。

sentences.english: Will sit-ups help prevent me from getting a little soft around the middle?
sentences.chinese: 仰卧起坐会不会帮助我的腹部练得不再柔软？

definition: to kick one's legs/leg press (exercise)/(coll.) to kick the bucket
to draw together/to place side by side (e.g. one's fingers, two halves of a torn sheet of paper etc)
